manipulators.description: command + u = option + shift + left (select word ahead)
shift + u = ctrl + shift + tab (prev tab)
option + command + j = option + shift + down (select para ahead)
option + j = option + down (move line down)
option + command + k = option + shift + up (select line above)
option + k = option + up (move line up)
command + i = option + shift + right (select word after)
shift + p = option + command + hyphen (zoom out)
option + command + y = select whole line to head
shift + y = command + shift + ` (prev window within app)
control + y = command + h (hide current window)
shift + o = command ` (next window within app)
control + o = option + command + h (expose all)
command + w = close all tab of app
command + s = alter tab sheet rev

rules.description: Press right_command to enable Normal Mode profile
Press  left_control+right_command to enable RDP Mode profile
Press right_command to enable Cursor Mode profile
Press left_control+right_command to enable Cursor Mode profile
